assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Beijing Shougang Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells iron and steel products in Mainland China. The company offers oriented and non-oriented electrical steel; hot plates comprising hot-rolled pickling sheets, weather-resistant steel, construction machinery steel, automobile structure steel, construction steel, and pipeline steel; plates products, such as bridge, energy, and pipeline steel; and automobile sheets, tin sheets, cold-rolled special-use plates, and color-coated sheets. It also engages in steel smelting and rolling, other metal smelting, and rolling processing; production and sales of sinters, pellets, coke and chemical products, secondary and multiple energy resource reuse products, cold-rolled sheets and galvanized steel coils; power generation and power supply; and manufacture of cold rolled electrical steel sheets and strips, special metallurgical equipment, motor, power transmission, and distribution and control equipment. In addition, it is involved in application software development; wholesale and retail of equipment for environmental protection, steel and water slag, dust removal and desulfurization ash, and steel and chemical products, as well as building materials, non-metallic minerals, metal materials, and chemical products; and general freight. Further, it engages in the leasing of machinery and equipment, and houses; import and export of goods and technology; design, production, agency, and release of domestic advertising; investment and asset management; project investment; and sale of steel and mechanical equipment. Additionally, it provides environmental protection, energy saving, and new material technology promotion; warehousing; management consulting; economic information and enterprise management; product quality inspection; technology development; and safety consulting services. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Beijing, the People's Republic of China. Beijing Shougang Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Shougang Group Co., Ltd.
